allow: Bash(node -e "const {execSync} = require\(''child_process''\); try { const out = execSync\(''npx node-gyp rebuild -- -Dskip_test=1'', {encoding: ''utf8'', stdio: ''pipe''}\); console.log\(out\); } catch\(e\) { console.log\(''STDOUT:'', e.stdout\); console.log\(''STDERR:'', e.stderr?.substring\(0, 2000\)\); console.log\(''STATUS:'', e.status\); }")

Bash(node -e "const {execSync} = require\(''child_process''\); try { const out = execSync\(''npx node-gyp rebuild -- -Dskip_test=1'', {encoding: ''utf8'', stdio: ''pipe''}\); console.log\(''Build successful''\); } catch\(e\) { console.log\(''STDERR:'', e.stderr?.substring\(0, 1000\)\); }")
